companyInfo.memberDamascusChamber: Member of Damascus Chamber of Commerce

argentina.title: Kabour International Group
argentina.desc: A leading company in the production, manufacture and distribution of mate in Syria and the Arab world. It has factories in Argentina and Syria and follows the highest levels of sterilization and uses technology to produce the best drink.

syria.title: Campo Company
syria.desc: A leading company in the production, manufacture and distribution of mate in Syria and the Arab world. It has factories in Argentina and Syria and follows the highest levels of sterilization and uses technology to produce the best drink.

centerDesc: Kabour International Group exports its products to various provinces across Syria. You can contact our distribution centers using the following numbers.

1.name: kaharta Green
1.desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc vulputate libero et velit interdum.

desc: The beverage Zhurat considered as the best which protects against colds, flu and cough that increases during the cold weather.
In addition to that, it also helps to expel toxins from the body, it strengthens the immune system, And also relieves headaches, And removes bloating and helps in the process of digestion.
usageInstructions: To Preserve the whole delicate flavor, put a bag of campo (Natural Zhourat) in a 250 ml cup, then pour boiling water and leave it for 3 minutes.
If you want a stronger taste, leave the bag in the water for 4 minutes.

studyData.ResearchersStudy: President of the International Society for Natural Food, based in Paris
studyData.desc: The most notable observation regarding yerba mate's effect on natural organs...
Yerba Mate contains alkaloids which, through their immediate appearance and action on organ principles...
We can conclude that yerba mate is a general stimulant (of plant origin), as well as a tonic...
